p: MaxiSorb™ ELISA plates (Thermo Fischer Scientific) were coated with 4–8 μg/ml purified influenza virus in 50 μl carbonate/bicarbonate buffer (pH = 9.6) overnight at 4°C. 100 μl per well of acetate buffer at different pH (7.2, 5.8, 5.4, 5.0, 4.4, and 4.4 + 0.1 M DTT) was added at RT for 30 min. Plates were washed two times, and ELISA was performed as described above.
